Card.cardDescription: Effect: Whenever you need to play or discard a DODGE, you may perform a judgment. If the result is RED, you are considered to have played or discarded a DODGE.
Effect: Ignore the effects of all BLACK ATTACKs that target you.

Effect: Ignore the effects of all BARBARIAN ASSAULT, HAIL OF ARROWS, and normal ATTACKs that target you. Whenever a source of damage deals FIRE damage to you, that damage is increased by +1 after calculation.
Effect: The max damage that can be dealt to you by a source is reduced to 1 damage. When this card is removed from your equipment zone, you gain 1 health.
